## My masterpiece in JS now:
```
function bmi(weight, height) {
  var result = weight/Math.pow(height,2) 
  
  if (result <= 18.5) {
    return "Underweight";
  } else if (result <= 25) {
    return "Normal";
  } else if (result <= 30) {
    return "Overweight";
  } else {
    return "Obese";
  }

}
```
